Migrating to versacord

Due to the original discord.py repository becoming read-only, we decided that it would be necessary to fork it and keep on developing further. We also wanted to change the name and voted on versacord in order to properly register it at pypi.

Porting from discord.py

In order to port a bot using discord.py to versacord, follow these steps:

  1. Uninstall discord.py:

    # Linux/macOS
    python3 -m pip uninstall discord.py

    # Windows
    py -3 -m pip uninstall discord.py

  2. Install versacord:

    # Linux/macOS
    python3 -m pip install -U versacord

    # Windows
    py -3 -m pip install -U versacord

  3. Update the following import statements:

    • import discord -> import versacord
    • from discord.ext -> from versacord.ext

  4. For all places in your code that used discord (embeds, colors, etc), change them to use versacord.

    Note

    Steps 3 and 4 are not entirely necessary and your code should still work, but is highly recommended.
